mapper.select: SELECT rppd.id, rppd.post_personnel_id as postPersonnelId, rppd.post_personnel_id as postPersonnelId, rppd.company_office_id as companyOfficeId, rppd.post_id as postId, rppd.per_shift as perShift, rppd.total_number as totalNumber, rppd.day_of_week as dayOfWeek, rppd.class_of_date as classOfDate, rppd.hour_of_class as hourOfClass, sco.`office_name` AS companyOfficeName FROM `record_post_personnel_data` rppd, sys_company_office sco WHERE rppd.`company_office_id` = sco.`id` AND rppd.`post_personnel_id` = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
